title: Broken Client/Game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
http://imgur.com/a/VTI8Y

I came home from school today and tried to open league and this came up. It was working fine yesterday right before I slept. Nobody else touches my computer. I restarted my computer and tried again, no luck. I uninstalled and then tried to reinstall, got the same error. No idea what happened? Please help? {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
I'd recommend running all available Windows updates (upgrade to 8.1 if you haven't already) and then try a clean reinstall of League using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) Open the app, then check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall* before you hit the **start** button. After this process has finished, launch League as admin by right--clicking the shortcut and selecting *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this worked!

It took like 3 tries, and the hextech thing wasn't working. I restarted my computer, then opened the Hextech kit and then it started working, and now it's currently reinstalling. Thank you so so so very much :DD
